title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze ideal rocket equation scenarios and report specific impulse comparisons.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Evaluate combustion chamber pressures and mixture ratios for given propellants.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a de Laval nozzle and estimate performance across altitude profiles.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Short-answer quiz on basic aerodynamic forces and coefficients.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Compute lift and drag for airfoils under subsonic conditions using given data.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Estimate aerodynamic heating for a blunt body and propose TPS choices.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Size a primary spacecraft panel to meet load and margin requirements.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate transfer ΔV, period, and phasing for a two-burn mission.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Closed-book exam on requirements, V&V, and interface control concepts.

title: Guidance Systems Lab
description: Implement a basic PID controller and characterize response to step inputs.

title: Attitude Control Simulation
description: Simulate rigid body attitude dynamics with external torques in MATLAB/Python.

title: Telemetry Packet Parser
description: Parse and validate telemetry frames; produce a decoded CSV and brief report.

title: Materials Fatigue Report
description: Analyze fatigue life under variable loading; include S–N curve discussion.

title: Vibration Test Plan
description: Draft a vibration test plan with input spectra and acceptance criteria.

title: Finite Element Mesh
description: Create and justify a meshing strategy for a bracket; compare refinements.

title: Power Budget Spreadsheet
description: Build a power budget with mode-by-mode margins and worst-case analysis.

title: Thermal Vacuum Test
description: Plan a TVAC test including cycles, instrumentation, and acceptance.

title: Radiation Shielding Study
description: Compare shielding materials; estimate TID for LEO and GEO environments.

title: Mission Design Proposal
description: Write a preliminary mission concept with objectives, ΔV, and risks.

title: Delta-V Trade Study
description: Perform ΔV tradeoffs for alternate trajectories with constraints.

title: Launch Operations Checklist
description: Create a pre-launch checklist including hold points and criteria.

title: Council Deliberation Essay
description: Essay on inter-species diplomacy and governance in Middle-earth.

title: Treaty Draft Between Realms
description: Draft a treaty framework addressing borders, trade, and security.

title: Case Study: War of the Ring
description: Analyze diplomatic failures and resolutions from the War of the Ring.
